name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the contractor of the Brazilian factory of Chinese automaker BYD was exposed to "enslaving Chinese employees".

Blogger "Bogo" disclosed more information: In addition to hiring workers from China, the Jinjiang Group also hired 470 local workers in Brazil, but the living environment, work intensity and other treatment of Brazilian and Chinese workers are completely different.

The equity of the Jinjiang Group was changed to BYD in 2017, which means that the Jinjiang Group is actually a subsidiary of BYD.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 27, a blogger used a video of "the master sitting in a sedan chair and talking about how to reduce the burden on sedan chair bearers" to satirize China's formalism and bureaucracy. 
Currently, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 27, human rights lawyer Peng Yonghe released a video criticizing the phenomenon of leaders being condescending when facing citizens: "We pay them to support them, not to let them lead us, but to let them serve us."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One blogger said: "If a European or American missile hit a civilian airliner, all news platforms in China would broadcast this story over and over for three days and three nights."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Blogger "Shadow Will Not Lie" attracted a large number of fans and attention by exposing the installation of hidden cameras in hotels and other places.
According to a report on December 27, police in many places cracked down on a criminal gang that installed "hidden cameras" to hype up the "rampant" phenomenon of hidden cameras and made illegal profits. "Shadow Will Not Lie" and 35 other people were arrested.
Netizens said that this can also be reversed. Is there still trust between people?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a viewer said that he recommended the movie "Fancheng" to people around him, but found that people no longer believed in Hong Kong movies. The lead actor Andy Lau said, "I will keep working hard, please believe me."
Netizen "Taozi" said: It's not that Hong Kong movies are of poor quality, but that the current Hong Kong movies are to be screened in the mainland, and the censorship system is very strict, which is very different from before the return. The color tone and script of the movie can't go back to the past, and the actors and producers sometimes can't speak out.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Liu Qiang, who once set fire in front of the Yasukuni Shrine, recently wore a Christmas hat and wished everyone a happy Christmas in Chinese and English, which was criticized by fans.
His fans said "You have changed"
"Brother Qiang, it is not appropriate for you to wear this hat"
"The hero must be thinking that he is disappointed with his achievements"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 27, Shaanxi. Migrant workers kneel outside the company to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 21, the police came to the Chengdu Early Rain Church to summon them for a Christmas dinner at home.
Multiple domestic video accounts refuted the rumor, saying that the reason for the dinner was that the church was listed as an illegal social organization by the Civil Affairs Department and banned according to law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a criminal defense lawyer popularized the chaos of occupying a pit defense. By forcibly appointing two lawyers, the defendant's own lawyer could not meet with the defendant or participate in the defense, and could not even enter the court gate. The forcibly appointed lawyers occupied the pit without doing anything, thus depriving the defendant of the right to defense.
The blogger complained that he was also asked by a certain agency to connect with the occupying pit, and asked him to occupy the pit as a defense lawyer for the case and not to speak in court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens complained in the comment area that the defense of the local lawyers was not confrontational at all, and was all about human relations. Only lawyers from other places dared to defend the case, because they were not afraid of offending the locals. However, even if they could not say a word of the prosecutor's defense, they would still be sentenced according to the prosecutor's suggestion in the end. You can defend as you like, and he can knock as he likes.
Some people said that he had experienced the court not opening the trial, but directly notifying him to receive the result, and was sentenced to 10 months in prison and suspended for one year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Dongfeng Qichen car owners in Zhengzhou collectively went to the 4S store to hang banners to protect their rights. At first, the car owners found that their vehicle batteries had seriously degraded after only three years of use, and the promised battery warranty became empty talk. In addition, the 4S store replaced the original car battery with a used battery of unknown origin without the owner's consent during maintenance, which caused the car owners to collectively hang banners to protect their rights and put slogans on their vehicles.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 26, a family member of a Henan Rural Commercial Bank called the Xinyang Municipal People's Court to inquire about the situation of a detained rural commercial bank depositor who was seeking to recover his deposits. He had been detained for almost a year on suspicion of "picking quarrels and provoking trouble" because he had gone to Henan several times to get his deposits back. The court neither held a trial nor released him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Sun, the director of the Manzhouli Municipal People's Congress Standing Committee, insulted and threatened the reporter on the phone: "I will ask the Public Security Bureau to arrest you, and I will arrest you in the end. What's the point of finding you? If you have the ability, come here, and I will kill you. If I don't put you in jail again, I will count you out (nb), and I will call you right away to deal with you." The staff of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress replied to the reporter: The leader does not accept interviews, so there is no need to contact him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 23, a driver in Guangdong received a fixed price "0 yuan" order, but was still considered responsible by the platform for canceling the order and fined 2 yuan.
The order was 2.5 kilometers away from the driver, and he had to drive 3.4 kilometers after picking up the passenger. The price of No. 92 gasoline in Guangdong is 7.5. Based on the fuel consumption of 9 liters per 100 kilometers in the urban area, the fuel cost of the total driving length of 5.9 kilometers of the order is 3.98 yuan, not counting the time cost. So even if the cancellation is deducted two yuan, it is more cost-effective than completing the order.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 23, after the June 1st Kindergarten in Luoshan County, Xinyang, Henan Province collected the annual tuition from parents, the person in charge lost contact. Currently, the children have no school to go to. There are many families affected, and parents have posted online to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the chaos of force-feeding goats before slaughter in Nanning, Guangxi was exposed. Some goats were stuffed to death, and dead goats were slaughtered without a license and flowed to the dining table. Many places made profits by force-feeding goats to increase their weight. Goats weighing 60 to 70 kilograms were force-fed to increase their weight by 7 to 8 kilograms, or even 20 kilograms. Goats that were weighted or even dead and rotten were sent to the trading center and sold without any quarantine and disinfection. When buyers asked for quarantine certificates, sellers found expired quarantine certificates from other companies instead. Goats that died after a large number of force-feeding were also sold openly in the market. Small vendors who bought dead goats said, "The meat is a little rotten and needs to be cut off."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 27, sanitation workers went on strike because they were owed wages for several months, leaving garbage everywhere.
The local town health station responded: wages were indeed owed for several months, but the contractor did not receive the money, so there was no money to pay the workers. The deputy station chief said they did not know why the contractor did not receive the money. At present, some sanitation workers have been advised to come to clean up without receiving wages.
The county health station said: There is no wage arrears, and there is no sanitation workers on strike

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The WeChat public account Yuncheng Research 2025 released several red research projects it launched, allowing children to wear Red Army uniforms, experience Red Army meals, fire cannons, weave straw sandals, etc.
Comments: "No hardship, no effort" and "Principal, please let the children go"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Brazil's Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Has stopped issuing temporary work visas to BYD.
Brazil's Ministry of Justice: If the violations found by prosecutors at BYD factories are confirmed, residence permits issued to Chinese workers will be revoked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 27 (Released) Netizens summarized the news about ordinary people getting rich by working or starting a business in 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 28, Anhui. On the Wuhu-Hefei Expressway, an ambulance kept honking its horn, but the truck in front refused to give way.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: CCTV released the "Beautiful Moments of 2024" video. A blogger later pointed out that the video contained multiple illegal scenes, for example: at 30 seconds, the mother rode a bicycle with her daughter, and the two did not wear helmets; at 55 seconds, the uncle selling balloons was probably operating without a license. The blogger said: I am not nitpicking, but these behaviors would most likely be punished in reality, but they became beautiful moments in CCTV. Since they are beautiful, can we be given a break in life?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Previously, the Beijing News reported the chaos of tank trucks carrying edible oil. On December 28, the newspaper reported that its reporter secretly visited an illegal slaughterhouse in Nanning and exposed the chaos of slaughter workers force-feeding sheep to increase their weight. Some sheep were even starved to death.
On December 6, a plucked goat was thin but had a bulging belly at a slaughterhouse in Xixiangtang District, Nanning City, Guangxi. The butcher used a knife to gently cut a hole in the sheep's belly, and the stomach of the sheep immediately gushed out of the sheep's belly and spread on the ground. Another knife cut the sheep's stomach, and green grass mixed with corn kernels immediately gushed out.
"There are about 10 kilograms of grass and fodder, all of which are fed in to increase weight." The butcher said that this is still a relatively small amount. On the same day, a sheep was fed 20 to 30 kilograms and died of suffocation...
The reporter found through undercover investigation that these goats purchased and transported from Yunnan, Sichuan, Guizhou and other places were almost all not inspected and quarantined. After arriving at Natong Town, Longan County, Nanning and Tanluo Town, Xixiangtang District,...
fullContent:
此前新京报曾报道油罐车混拉食用油乱象，12月28日报道，该报记者暗访南宁一处非法屠宰窝点，曝光屠宰工给羊灌食增重的乱象，有的羊甚至被活活撑死。
 12月6日，广西南宁市西乡塘区一处屠宰点内一只煺了毛的山羊体形精瘦，但肚子却鼓鼓囊囊。屠宰工用刀在羊肚皮上轻轻划开一道口子，被打了料的羊胃立即涌出羊腹摊在地上。再一刀划开羊胃，夹杂着玉米粒的绿色草料，立马喷涌而出。
 “草料有十来斤吧，都是灌进去增重的。”屠宰工说，这还算灌得比较少的，当天还有一只羊被灌了二三十斤，活活撑死的……
 记者暗访发现，这些从云南、四川、贵州等地收购运来的山羊，几乎都未经过检验检疫，在运抵南宁隆安县那桐镇、西乡塘区坛洛镇后，被送进路边多个非法灌食点进行草料灌注，增重后又进入南宁市西乡塘区广西新又鲜肉制食品有限公司的牛羊交易中心进行交易。
 按规定，牛羊等牲畜交易、屠宰前必须进行检验检疫，但该交易中心无法提供正规检疫合格证明，不少商户都是从其他市场购买检疫合格证提供给有需求的牛羊买家。灌食撑死的羊以及运输途中不明原因死亡的山羊，几乎都被送进交易市场附近的“黑”屠宰点进行宰杀处理，流向餐桌，成为食品安全隐患。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 28, Nanjing, Jiangsu. A girl posted that she was studying at Nanjing No. 12 Middle School. During her time at school, she was bullied and excluded by classmate B and the whole class. When she and her father walked out of the classroom, the class even applauded.
Afterwards, the girl's post on the social platform was blocked by the platform, and she received a call from the police, asking her to delete the post.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the media reported on cases of disability caused by domestic violence:
Ms. Xie from Chengdu, Sichuan, was abused by her husband 16 times in two years, which resulted in her having to wear a feces bag for life and suffering varying degrees of damage to many internal organs. On the 27th, the abuser He Zhongyang was sentenced to 11 years.
In Liangshan, Sichuan, the song Tiegumu was burned by her husband with white wine over a large area, and her face was disfigured. She said that she had been abused by her husband countless times in the 14 years of marriage, and she is still insisting on seeking justice.
In Enshi, Hubei, 27-year-old Xiao Chen was burned by her ex-boyfriend with gasoline because she refused her ex-boyfriend's request for reconciliation. Her face was disfigured and horrible, and her left hand was amputated.
Xingtai, Hebei. Yang Ningning was strangled by her husband while she was sleeping, resulting in paraplegia and lifelong disability. Yang Ningning said that she had been beaten by her husband before the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a picture with the allusion of "burying the child for the mother" engraved on a stone sculpture at a tourist attraction went viral on the Internet, triggering complaints from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 28, Sichuan. It was revealed online that the power policy of Sichuan Power Trading Center was recently adjusted, causing more than 200 power sales companies to suffer huge losses. Many power companies went to the Sichuan Power Trading Center to hang banners, and some were taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the media and netizens have stated that December 24 is not Christmas Eve, but the anniversary of the victory of the Battle of Changjin Lake. However, some netizens pointed out that Baidu Encyclopedia once showed that the end time of the "Battle of Changjin Lake" was December 13, 1950, and then it was changed to December 24. According to the historical records of Baidu Encyclopedia, the January 2019 version showed that the battle time was from November 27 to December 13, 1950, and in the 21-year version, the end time of the battle was changed to December 24.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many netizens complained that this year's postgraduate entrance examination English is too difficult. Internet celebrity English teacher Tan Jianbo said: The overall environment this year is not good, and the employment situation is severe. He called on the question-setting team to be more compassionate and consider the average level of candidates.
Afterwards, Teacher Tan Jianbo said that he was banned just after starting the live broadcast, and decided to stop for a short period of time to dilute the platform's control over him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 28, Nanchang, Jiangxi. A man hung a portrait of Xi Jinping and gave a speech outdoors to speak for Li Yixue, and was then taken away by the police. The man said, "They said you disturbed public order and put all kinds of laws on you. I'm not saying you are a disgrace, I feel you have lost Chairman Xi's people."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 27, students from Jiangsu Ma Ling Middle School launched a collective protest when they heard that the school would not be on New Year's Day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, it was revealed online that the salaries of teachers and civil servants in Lufeng City, Guangdong Province were in arrears.
In response, teacher Xu Jimin sent several open letters, saying that the GDP growth rate of Lufeng City was encouraging, but the problem of teachers' salaries had not been resolved. He requested the government to give an explanation on this matter, when the arrears of salary would be paid, and called on the Ministry of Education to implement a number of measures to respect teachers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 28, a netizen posted a post about his overseas experience. The netizen said that he had been stationed abroad for five years. During his time abroad, his passport was confiscated, the food and accommodation were poor, different nationalities were treated differently, Chinese people had to bear more workload, and it was difficult to take sick leave.
The netizen said: Working in a Chinese company is like working like a cow or a horse.
The post has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Central Communist Youth League mentioned in an article published in 2022: The Battle of Changjin Lake took place from November 26 to December 13, 1950.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 28 (Released) A Ukrainian veteran talked about the reason for joining the army, which was very touching. He said that before joining the army, he was a tractor driver. Because his child died in the war, he also joined the Ukrainian army. He choked up and said, "I am an adult, but I don't know why, I can't control my tears."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Russia recently released a Christmas promotional video: Western Santa Claus was shot down by the air defense system over the Kremlin.
The video shows that De Moroz (Russian version of Santa Claus) and an air defense system operator said: "The target has been destroyed. Western things are not allowed to appear in the Russian sky. Happy New Year!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, at a criminal trial in Xilinhot Court, Inner Mongolia, several lawyers who were attending the trial were sprayed with pepper spray by bailiffs, but the local police refused to file a case.
On December 28, the five lawyers who were victims of the incident issued a joint statement, questioning the court's decision not to allow lawyers to bring mobile phones to attend the trial, the bailiffs' actions of snatching lawyers' mobile phones and spraying pepper spray on them, and demanding an apology and compensation from the court involved.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 26, Xiangtan, Hunan. Veterans wearing military uniforms took photos at the Mao Zedong Memorial Hall in Shaoshan, but were stopped by the police.
Photographer: These people are all heroes who defended the country, why can't they take photos?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 27, the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council stated that it is studying and formulating guidelines for the final adjustment of state-owned enterprise managers and the withdrawal of incompetent personnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the 28th, Ukraine released the third part of the diary of North Korean soldier Jong Hyun-hong who died in Kursk Oblast:
He said in his diary that he was personally ordered by Kim Jong-un to be sent thousands of kilometers away to provide support to the Russian army due to some fault.
He also expressed his loyalty to Kim Jong-un in his diary: I grew up in the arms of the loving party, studying and living without worries...
See Figure 2 for the full translation:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xi Jinping mentioned in his speech at the Political Bureau's democratic life meeting: "Dare to manage and govern, strictly manage and govern" "The situation must be extremely clear, the attitude must be extremely firm, and we must never relax or be soft." The meeting announcement focuses on "consolidating and deepening party discipline", "giving play to the party's discipline education and constraints", and "studying and implementing the disciplinary regulations", which seems to mean that those who "violate discipline" will be "punished by party discipline." However, those present are all members of China's highest ruling class, and Xi Jinping requires them to "conduct self-examination and party spirit analysis in light of their thoughts and work realities, and carry out criticism and self-criticism."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 27, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said: China-Japan relations are at a critical stage of improvement and development.
On December 26, the People's Daily Zhongsheng said: China and the United States should extend the cooperation list and expand the cooperation cake.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 26, Cailian News reported that "the number of Americans applying for unemployment benefits has risen to the highest level in more than three years", which triggered ridicule from netizens.
Netizens responded, "Yesterday they were still advocating for China-US friendship, but today they are smearing it"
"Weren't we friendly yesterday?"
